pullRequest.title: Filter empty fields in SearchHit#toXContent
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit restores the filtering of empty fields during the
xcontent serialization of SearchHit. The filtering was removed
unintentionally in #41656.

nodes.bodyText: It would be great to have a a test for this too.
Can we also check that the fields object is not only empty in the xContent rendering but really not present? I think the parsed object would contain an empty map regardless.
